title: Dialogic Theory-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Development Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical operations and algebraic concepts
context.additional_context: Reflective practice learning environment aimed at enhancing mathematical thinking and fostering job application skills for job seekers

learning_goals: Learners can solve math problems reflecting real job situations with over 80% accuracy through interactive dialogue.
Learners can refine problem-solving strategies at least three times through peer feedback and reflective practice.
Learners can consistently perform 15-minute modular learning sessions in mobile environments at least four times weekly.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
